实例总数.任务描述: 统计原始字段实例总记录数

去重后标准字段数.任务描述: 统计去重后的标准字段数

数据类型分布 (枚举).SQL查询: SELECT COALESCE(data_type, 'unknown') || ':' || COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields GROUP BY data_type

有描述比例.任务描述: 统计有描述的字段比例
有描述比例.SQL查询: SELECT ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2) || '%' FROM regular_fields

关键字段空值检测.SQL查询: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields WHERE table_id IS NULL

关键字段空值检测.任务描述: 检测没有关联数据源的原始字段数量
关键字段空值检测.SQL查询: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields WHERE datasource_id IS NULL

关键字段空值检测.任务描述: 检测没有上游数据列的原始字段数量
关键字段空值检测.SQL查询: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields WHERE upstream_column_id IS NULL

关键字段空值检测.任务描述: 检测字段与标准字段的关联完整性（必须全覆盖）
关键字段空值检测.SQL查询: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields WHERE unique_id IS NULL

未匹配血缘检测.任务描述: 检测没有被任何视图引用的原始字段数量
未匹配血缘检测.SQL查询: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields rf WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM regular_field_to_view rfv WHERE rfv.field_id = rf.id)

未匹配血缘检测.任务描述: 检测没有血缘记录的字段数量
未匹配血缘检测.SQL查询: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regular_fields rf WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM regular_field_full_lineage rfl WHERE rfl.field_id = rf.id)

关联元素.任务描述: 验证实例字段与标准字段的 N:1 关系

关联验证.正向SQL (实例>标准): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.unique_id) FROM regular_fields rf
关联验证.反向SQL (标准>实例): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT urf.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) FROM unique_regular_fields urf JOIN regular_fields rf ON urf.id = rf.unique_id

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段与物理表的 N:1 来源关系

关联验证.正向SQL (字段>物理表): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.table_id) FROM regular_fields rf JOIN tables t ON rf.table_id = t.id WHERE t.is_embedded = 0
关联验证.反向SQL (物理表>字段): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) FROM tables t JOIN regular_fields rf ON t.id = rf.table_id WHERE t.is_embedded = 0

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段与嵌入表的 N:1 关系

关联验证.正向SQL (字段>嵌入表): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.table_id) FROM regular_fields rf JOIN tables t ON rf.table_id = t.id WHERE t.is_embedded = 1

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段与上游数据列的 N:1 关系

关联验证.正向SQL (字段>数据列): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.upstream_column_id) FROM regular_fields rf WHERE rf.upstream_column_id IS NOT NULL
关联验证.反向SQL (数据列>字段): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) FROM db_columns c JOIN regular_fields rf ON c.id = rf.upstream_column_id

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段与数据源的 N:M 所属关系
关联元素.关联方式: 原始字段 > 血缘表 > 数据源 (同名字段聚合)

关联验证.正向SQL (字段>数据源): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.datasource_id) FROM regular_fields rf WHERE rf.datasource_id IS NOT NULL
关联验证.反向SQL (数据源>字段): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ds.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rf.id) FROM datasources ds JOIN regular_fields rf ON ds.id = rf.datasource_id
关联验证.API统计逻辑: 返回 all_datasources 数组长度

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段被视图引用的 M:N 关系

关联验证.正向SQL (字段>视图): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rfv.field_id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rfv.view_id) FROM regular_field_to_view rfv
关联验证.反向SQL (视图>字段): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT v.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rfv.field_id) FROM views v JOIN regular_field_to_view rfv ON v.id = rfv.view_id
关联验证.API统计逻辑: 返回 usedInViews 数组长度

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段与工作簿的关联关系 (通过血缘表聚合)

关联验证.正向SQL (字段>工作簿): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rfl.field_id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rfl.workbook_id) FROM regular_field_full_lineage rfl WHERE rfl.workbook_id IS NOT NULL
关联验证.反向SQL (工作簿>字段): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT w.id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT rfl.field_id) FROM workbooks w JOIN regular_field_full_lineage rfl ON w.id = rfl.workbook_id
关联验证.API统计逻辑: 返回 all_workbooks 数组长度

关联元素.任务描述: 验证原始字段被计算字段依赖的关系

关联验证.正向SQL (原始字段>指标): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cfd.dependency_regular_field_id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT cfd.source_field_id) FROM calc_field_dependencies cfd WHERE cfd.dependency_regular_field_id IS NOT NULL
关联验证.反向SQL (指标>原始字段): SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cfd.source_field_id) || ':' || COUNT(DISTINCT cfd.dependency_regular_field_id) FROM calc_field_dependencies cfd WHERE cfd.dependency_regular_field_id IS NOT NULL
关联验证.API统计逻辑: 返回 used_by_metrics 数组长度
